source.name: Player's Guide to Tanares
source.author: Alexandre Aboud, Clayton Machado and Michael Alves.
source.description:
Create Unique Characters
Dive into the "Player's Guide to Tanares," a treasure trove crafted for both Tanares and any 5e setting. Whether you're exploring Tanares, realms of your imagination, or established worlds, this guide offers unmatched versatility.
Discover:
• Four Unique Classes: From the might of Dragonblades and the insanity-driven Madwalkers to the charm of Redeemers and wisdom of Elementalists. • Four Simple Classes: Designed for easy learning and deep immersion in your stories. • Expansive Additions: 16 new subclasses, hundreds of spells, diverse backgrounds, feats, and equipment. • New Species: Immerse in the lore of Tanares with four distinct species Arm yourself with unmatched tools and let your adventures in Tanares—and beyond—begin!
